translation.en: [narrator] The Flounders.
A ragtag team of rejects from the Valley...
translation.it: Una squadra di falliti della Valle,

translation.en: assembled for one reason
and one reason only.
-[narrator] To fail. -[thuds]
-[spits] -[narrator] But they didn't fail.
They didn't exactly succeed,
-but they didn't fail. -[Tyler grunts]
Thanks to a technicality,
they passed the Junior Rescue Training.
Now, they'll be protecting the beaches of Malibu
translation.it: Ora proteggeranno le spiagge di Malibu

translation.en: from Tower Two.
-[upbeat music playing] -[narrator] Tyler, the wise guy
translation.it: Tyler. Il saggio dai bei capelli.

translation.en: with the great hair.
-Gina... -[grunts] ...the tough one.
Lizzie. Spunky, with a dark side.
translation.it: Lizzie. Intrepida con un lato oscuro.

translation.en: Dylan, the captain with a lot to prove.
translation.it: Dylan. Il capitano con tanto da dimostrare.

translation.en: Eric, the heart of the group.
And... Tyler--
-[Gina] Hold on. -[cell phone beeps]
-You already said Tyler. -I did?
You started with him. It's way too much Tyler.
I think it's exactly the right amount of me.
translation.it: C'è la giusta quantità di me.

translation.en: Of course you do.
"Spunky with a dark side"? I don't see it.
translation.it: Intrepida con un lato oscuro? Ma no.

translation.en: Oh! Did I tell you? My dad was mowing the lawn in his bare feet and he cut off three toes.
translation.it: Mio padre si è tagliato tre dita e io ho chiesto al medico

translation.en: I asked the doctor if I could sew one on and he said maybe next time.
[giggling] I really hope there's a next time!
Oh. "Spunky with a dark side." I hear it now.
translation.it: Intrepida con un lato oscuro. Ora capisco.

translation.en: Yo, Eric, I can't believe you made this. Where'd you get the footage?
translation.it: Assurdo. Dove hai preso i filmati?

translation.en: Vooch shot it.
I also do weddings and bar mitzvahs.
translation.it: Faccio pure matrimoni e bar mitzvah.

translation.en: Guys, squeeze in.
I wanna get a pic of your first day as official Malibu Junior Rescue.
translation.it: Voglio farvi una foto nel vostro primo giorno.

translation.en: Everybody say, "Who's driving?"
[all] Who's driving?
Wait, who is driving?
[Dylan] Where are they?
Please, please, please, don't be late on our first day!
translation.it: Non fate tardi il primo giorno.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Dylan! Where's your "team"?
You know... I thought I smelled Valley trash earlier, but it turns out I was just walking by the dumpster.
translation.it: Ecco, sentivo puzza di Valle, prima, ma erano solo i cassonetti.

translation.en: [laughing awkwardly] That's funny!
You know, they're on their way. Be here any second.
Boop-boop! Oh, just got a text. [giggles]
-They're right around the corner. -Did you just say, "boop-boop"?
translation.it: Sono dietro l'angolo. Come hai detto?

translation.en: No, that's the sound my phone makes when I get a text. [laughs]
translation.it: Ho mimato la suoneria del mio telefono.

translation.en: Oh, hang on, I gotta respond.
-Click, click, click, click, click... -Your phone is wack.
Just admit it, Dylan. You can't handle being a captain. Garvin should have never given you a tower.
translation.it: Non sei tagliata come capitano. Garvin non doveva darti la torre.

translation.en: Hey, guys! Ready to save some lives?
Oh! Can you say it again? Eric's head was in the way.
Vooch has been filming us for weeks without our knowledge.
translation.it: Ci riprende di nascosto da giorni.

translation.en: Oh, that's... troubling.
[gasps] All right, all right, I'm coming. I'll be right there.
I'm so proud of you guys. Aw! Kill it today, okay?
translation.it: Sono orgoglioso di voi. Stendeteli, oggi. No, aspettate...

translation.en: No, wait!
Save it.
-["Wedding March" playing] -[bus rattling]
You guys, you're here! You're officially Malibu Junior Rescue!
translation.it: Siete qui. Siete ufficialmente dei soccorritori.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[chuckles] Yeah! Now what?
[Dylan] Malibu Beach.
Twenty-seven miles of the most beautiful coast in the world, and it's our job to protect all of it.
translation.it: Ben 43 km di stupenda costa, e il nostro lavoro è proteggerla.

translation.en: From the beach, from the water, from the air...
Not space. That's not really our jurisdiction.
translation.it: No, quello non è nostra giurisdizione.

translation.en: [Brody] All right!
Welcome to the first day of Malibu Beach Junior Rescue! Come on!
translation.it: Benvenuti al vostro primo giorno da Soccorritori junior.

translation.en: [Brody] Now listen.
Our job is about more than just hangin' out at our towers and lookin' pretty.
translation.it: Il nostro lavoro va oltre l'essere belli sulle nostre torri.

translation.en: But some of us can't help it. Am I right, Tower One?
translation.it: Ma per alcuni è inevitabile, eh, Torre uno?

translation.en: -Come on. -[Tower One cheers]
Junior Rescue also gets assignments each morning, and I'm the one in charge of handing them out. [laughs]
translation.it: Riceverete incarichi ogni mattina e sarò io ad assegnarli.

translation.en: Most are dope. Some are super lame. But they all gotta get done.
translation.it: Alcuni sono forti, altri no. Ma devono essere svolti tutti.

translation.en: So get pumped, Tower One, because I gave us ATV Patrol.
translation.it: Carichi, Torre uno, abbiamo la pattuglia quad!

translation.en: -Come on! -[Tower One cheers]
Everybody else... check the board. Let's go!
translation.it: Gli altri controllino la lavagna. Forza!

translation.en: I wonder what assignment we got!
[sighs] This is an official Junior Rescue assignment?
I thought we were gonna rescue swimmers, scan for sharks, run in slow motion.
translation.it: Io volevo correre al rallentatore, salvando nuotatori.

translation.en: -You know, cool stuff. -And we will.
translation.it: Io volevo correre al rallentatore, salvando nuotatori. Lo faremo.

translation.en: Well, not run in slow motion. Nobody can do that. But for right now, we have to focus on the assignment we got,
translation.it: Senza il rallentatore. Ma per ora concentriamoci su quest'incarico.

translation.en: and keeping the beach clean is important.
I know it's not exciting or glamorous.
You guys, I just checked Instagram,
and Jiffpom was here, like, five minutes ago!
translation.it: che Jiffpom è stato qui da poco.

translation.en: Any one of these piles could be his!
Is it just me, or are there a surprising amount of turds on this beach?
translation.it: Ma quante cacche ci sono su questa spiaggia?

translation.en: [Brody] Come on.
Didn't want you guys to get bored, so I restocked the beach for you, losers.
translation.it: Ho riempito la spiaggia per non farvi annoiare, perdenti.

translation.en: He borrowed three dogs just to mess with us, and we're losers.
translation.it: Ha preso tre cani per dispetto e siamo noi i perdenti?

translation.en: [Brody] Yes, I did.
-I'm gonna handle this. -[Dylan] Tyler, stop.
Okay? it's not worth it. Just ignore him.
translation.it: Non ne vale la pena, ignoralo.

translation.en: Oh, hey, uh, watch your step, 'cause Tiger here ate a block of cheddar earlier, and it is not agreeing with him.
translation.it: Attenzione, perché Tiger ha mangiato del cheddar e gli ha fatto male.

translation.en: Oh, not one bit. All right, have fun.
-That was some good poopin', you guys! -[dog barks]
[laughs] Yes, it was.
I hate that guy.
[Eric] Hand sanitizer for you, and you...
and you, and me.
Lizzie, you want in on this?
No, thanks, I'm good.
Usually I think my mom's crazy for packing things like this...
translation.it: Mi lamento quando mamma mi dà certe cose,

translation.en: but I'm lovin' it right now.
-Uh, Dylan, can you do my back? -Yeah.
Well, thanks to Brody, now I have to burn these.
translation.it: Grazie a Brody, queste devo bruciarle.

translation.en: -What's his problem? -He's just trying to get to us.
translation.it: - Che problema ha? - Vuole darci noia.

translation.en: -Well, it's working. -Look, Dylan, you're our tower captain.
translation.it: Funziona. - Come capitano, devi fare qualcosa. - Sì.

translation.en: -You have to do something. -I am.
translation.it: - Come capitano, devi fare qualcosa. - Sì.

translation.en: I'm gonna take us back to our tower, and we're gonna forget all about Brody
translation.it: Torneremo alla torre e ci dimenticheremo di Brody.

translation.en: and focus on saving lives. Come on, guys, let's go.
There's my least favorite tower.
translation.it: Ecco la torre che mi piace di meno. Ho altri lavori per voi.

translation.en: -Got a couple more jobs for you guys. -But we already did all our assignments.
translation.it: Ecco la torre che mi piace di meno. Ho altri lavori per voi. Abbiamo fatto tutto.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but a couple slipped through the cracks,
translation.it: Lo so, ma me ne sono sfuggiti un paio

translation.en: and it's up to me to make sure they get done... by you.
translation.it: e devo assicurarmi che facciate tutto... voi.

translation.en: Buoy maintenance?
Swim fin disinfection?
It's almost like someone's giving us the worst jobs on purpose.
translation.it: Ci dà il peggio di proposito.

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah, it is, isn't it?
That's not fair.
But, it is hilarious.
[Brody] What can I say?
When you guys humiliated us in front of the mayor, you started a war.
translation.it: Umiliandoci davanti al sindaco, avete iniziato una guerra.

translation.en: You're punishing us because we saved a life?
translation.it: - Abbiamo salvato una vita. Ci punisci? - Certo!

translation.en: Doy! Uh... What did you think was gonna happen?
translation.it: - Abbiamo salvato una vita. Ci punisci? - Certo! Che pensavate?

translation.en: I don't know, we'd be praised for our heroism and welcomed among you?
translation.it: Di essere osannati come eroi e accolti da voi?

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, joke's on you, brah. You'll never be one of us.
translation.it: Peggio per te. Non sarai mai uno di noi.

translation.en: We all agree we gotta take that guy down, right?
No, we all agree that no matter what Brody throws at us, we're gonna do such a great job that even he'll have to admit we belong here.
translation.it: No, dobbiamo fare un ottimo lavoro, così ammetterà che siamo parte del gruppo.

translation.en: [sighs] I can't believe I'm saying this right now, but... Dylan's right.
translation.it: Sono stupita di me, ma ha ragione.

translation.en: We want people to respect us, we have to earn it.
Yes, exactly! Take the high road.
Come on, team. Let's go scrape barnacles off the buoys.
translation.it: Andiamo a ripulire le boe dai crostacei.

translation.en: Taking the high road sucks.
We earned our spot here, and you're gonna let him ruin our summer? Forget that. We gotta fight fire with fire.
translation.it: Vuoi che ci facciamo rovinare l'estate? Rispondiamo al fuoco col fuoco.

translation.en: [Dylan] What does that even mean?
It means we gotta prank Brody so hard that he'll never mess with us again.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fargli uno scherzo che non dimenticherà.

translation.en: Tyler, everybody already thinks we don't deserve to be here!
translation.it: Già credono che non meritiamo il posto.

translation.en: If we go after Brody instead of doing our job, it'll just prove them right.
translation.it: Se perseguitiamo Brody, dimostreremo che ha ragione.

translation.en: I'm your captain, and I say we scrape buoys.
translation.it: Sono il capitano e dico di pulire le boe.

translation.en: And I will, as soon as I'm done shutting Brody up. Trust me.
translation.it: Lo farò, dopo aver zittito Brody. Fidati.

translation.en: Tyler! [sighs]
I can't believe him! Can you believe him?
Actually, I gotta go with Tyler on this one. I mean, it's classic first day of kindergarten.
translation.it: Io appoggio Tyler. È come il primo giorno di asilo.

translation.en: Find the biggest kid on the yard... and take her to knuckle town.
translation.it: Trova il più grosso e battiti con lui.

translation.en: [knuckles crack] Then everybody knows you're no one's punk.
translation.it: e battiti con lui. Tutti ti porteranno rispetto. Scusa, Dylan.

translation.en: Sorry, Dylan!
translation.it: Tutti ti porteranno rispetto. Scusa, Dylan.

translation.en: This is crazy!
Pretty much.
Right, there's gotta be something in here I can use to prank Brody.
translation.it: Deve esserci qualcosa per fare uno scherzo a Brody.

translation.en: Ooh, hello.
Speargun.
-This will totally shut him up. -[fires]
Uh, maybe something less permanent.
-[grunts, groans] -[equipment jangles]
Tyler? Tyler, are you in here?
[Tyler, grunting] Over... here.
I wanna help get back at Brody.
Is it bad?
[chuckles softly] It's horrible.
Then why are you smiling?
'Cause I get to take 'em out.
No, no, no. No, no, no, no. I'm good.
I'm good. I'm good. [screams]
[Dylan] Hey. We went ahead and grouped the buoys into piles. That's yours, that's Tyler's, that's Lizzie's.
translation.it: Abbiamo diviso le boe. Per te, per Tyler e per Lizzie.

translation.en: -Where are those guys? -[Dylan] They promised me
translation.it: Dove sono? Dovevano tornare subito dopo aver fatto quello che non dovevano fare.

translation.en: they'd be right back as soon as they finished doing the thing I told them not to do.
translation.it: Dovevano tornare subito dopo aver fatto quello che non dovevano fare.

translation.en: So you just let them go?
No, I didn't let them. They just... didn't listen.
translation.it: Io ci ho provato. Non ascoltano.

translation.en: Hey, that's not right. We're a team. We can't accomplish anything unless we're together.
translation.it: Non è giusto, siamo una squadra. Dobbiamo lavorare insieme.

translation.en: -I'll go get them. -No, wait!
Seriously? We can't be a team if everyone keeps leaving.
translation.it: Davvero? Che squadra è se tutti se ne vanno?

translation.en: -Why is nobody listening to me? -[Gina] Don't beat yourself up.
translation.it: Perché nessuno mi ascolta? Non abbatterti. Non è colpa tua se non ti rispettano.

translation.en: It's not your fault the team doesn't respect you.
translation.it: Non abbatterti. Non è colpa tua se non ti rispettano.

translation.en: What, you think the team doesn't respect me?
-You think they do? -I did.
Well, they don't.
I ran out of bandages, so I had to get creative.
Thanks, Lizzie.
Uh, missed one. [chuckles]
Let's just get the supplies to prank Brody.
Ooh, grab that rope.
I have an idea.
Somebody's coming. We're not supposed to be in here. Hide!
[sighs] Hi, Eric.
[screams] They're alive?
translation.it: Sono vivi! Scusa per la respirazione.

translation.en: I'm sorry about the mouth-to-mouth. I'd never done it before!
translation.it: Sono vivi! Scusa per la respirazione. Era la prima volta. Non sapevo della lingua!

translation.en: I didn't know you weren't supposed to use tongue!
translation.it: Era la prima volta. Non sapevo della lingua!

translation.en: Eric... it's me.
[chuckles sheepishly] I knew that.
You guys, Dylan, Gina, and I have been doing all the work.
translation.it: Ci avete lasciati soli a lavorare.

translation.en: You gotta come help.
We are helping. We're getting Brody to back off.
But Dylan said--
Dylan wants us to do this.
Then why did she tell you not to?
translation.it: E perché vi ha detto di no?

translation.en: Think about it. She's the captain. She can't tell us to break the rules.
translation.it: Pensaci, è il capitano. Non può dirci di farlo. Ma nemmeno a lei piace Brody.

translation.en: But she doesn't like Brody any more than we do.
translation.it: Non può dirci di farlo. Ma nemmeno a lei piace Brody.

translation.en: -I don't know... -[Tyler] Well, I do!
-Tyler? Where are you? -[Tyler] Let's just say
I didn't jump into a bin full of fish hooks...
translation.it: Di certo non in un secchio di ami

translation.en: [groaning] ...and I definitely didn't do it twice.
translation.it: e non per la seconda volta.

translation.en: [whispers] Yes, he did.
Then, how am I supposed to get everyone to respect me as the captain?
First, stop asking questions like that. Captains don't ask.
translation.it: Smettila di fare domande. I capitani non chiedono.

translation.en: Okay, let's say you were captain. How would you--
translation.it: Se tu fossi il capitano, come...

translation.en: You're asking again.
[scoffs] When was the last time anybody cleaned these things?
translation.it: Sono mai state pulite, queste cose?

translation.en: Half my team has bailed on me, Brody thinks I'm a joke...
translation.it: La squadra mi ha abbandonata. Brody mi deride.

translation.en: Maybe I'm not cut out for this.
Gross.
You're right. Doubting yourself is gross!
[sighs] But how can I not?
I mean, I've been here three summers. I know Junior Rescue inside and out.
translation.it: Sono qui da tre estati, conosco bene il lavoro. Sono capitano.

translation.en: I even made captain. Everyone still walks all over me.
translation.it: Sono qui da tre estati, conosco bene il lavoro. Sono capitano. E tutti mi calpestano.

translation.en: You better figure it out fast, 'cause we're the only ones working, and these fins are disgusting.
translation.it: Devi capirlo in fretta, perché lavoriamo solo noi e fa schifo.

translation.en: -[ominous cello music playing] -Ew! What is that? Eel barf?
-[creature snarls] -[gasps] Something in here just moved!
What is that?
Wait. Those look like tentacles.
-[ominous music grows louder] -Is that what I think it is?
You guys know you got stuff all over your face, right? [snickers]
translation.it: Sapete che avete della roba in faccia?

translation.en: That's it! I'm not doing this all summer! I'm taking him down.
translation.it: Non lo sopporto tutta l'estate. Dobbiamo fermarlo.

translation.en: Gina, wait!
When Brody comes back to Tower One, he'll step into this net.
translation.it: Quando Brody verrà, cadrà nella rete.

translation.en: Which is attached to that parasail.
All of which is attached to that Polaris.
I'll drive off, dragging Brody across Dog Beach,
the parasail will open, lifting him into the air and out over the ocean.
translation.it: e il paracadute si aprirà, sollevandolo in aria.

translation.en: Then we'll release the rope, and kersploosh!
You can say "kersploosh, kersplat, kersplunk." It's still a ker-felony!
translation.it: Splish-splash, ma è pur sempre un reato, ragazzi.

translation.en: This is crazy!
Is it crazy or is it crazy?
translation.it: È da pazzi o è da pazzi?

translation.en: I'm not hearing the difference.
-Eric, we're doing this for the team. -What team?
Ever since you decided to prank Brody, we haven't been a team.
translation.it: Ve ne siete andati, non siamo una squadra.

translation.en: Somebody had to do something. Dylan didn't have a plan.
translation.it: - Dylan non aveva un piano. - Sì, invece.

translation.en: Yes, she did. You just didn't give it a chance.
translation.it: - Dylan non aveva un piano. - Sì, invece. Ma l'hai ignorato. E anche lei.

translation.en: You ignored her.
translation.it: Ma l'hai ignorato. E anche lei.

translation.en: I didn't mean to.
Well, you did.
It's our first day, and we're already falling apart.
Don't you get it?
This is exactly what Brody wants.
You're right.
Are you serious? We're bailing? Yeah. We should be helping our team.
I'll take the Polaris back. Follow me, and you guys untie the net.
There. Fine. Take it apart.
I wanna help you take down Brody.
No, no, no, no, no! I just talked them out of it.
"Cleaning the outhouses."
Sounds like a Tower Two job to me.
What the...
Help me!
[yells] There's dog poo in my hair!
translation.it: Ho cacca di cane in testa!

translation.en: [sobbing] Things like this don't happen to Brody!
translation.it: Queste cose non succedono a Brody.

translation.en: -Whoa! -[Brody] Help me!
Yes, it worked!
Uh, which is very bad.
Wait! No, Tyler! We didn't untie the net!
translation.it: No, Tyler, non abbiamo slegato la rete.

translation.en: [Brody] Help!
What's going on? [screaming]
Help me!
[Brody] Oh, I can see my tower from up here.
translation.it: Si vede la torre da quassù.

translation.en: [Brody] Ow, my boat key.
[gasps] What did you guys do?
Nothing! I thought we agreed we weren't gonna pull the prank.
Why'd you make it so dangerous?
-That's what I said. -It was Lizzie's idea.
-Which worked beautifully, by the way. -[Dylan] Enough!
You guys have been ignoring me all day, and that ends now!
translation.it: Mi avete ignorata tutto il giorno, ora basta.

translation.en: I'm the captain. You're gonna do what I say, how I say it, when I say it.
translation.it: Sono il capitano e voi ora dovete fare esattamente come dico io.

translation.en: -You got a problem with that? -No.
No what?
No, Captain!
Tyler, Gina, we need something in case he falls.
translation.it: Serve qualcosa per attutire la caduta.

translation.en: Lizzie, Eric, grab some rappelling gear and meet me at the Polaris.
translation.it: Prendete delle corde e vediamoci al quad.

translation.en: [Dylan] Come on, guys, let's go!
Once I hook the net, pull him up with the winch.
[Brody] Why is this happening? Help me! Help me!
Brody, calm down, we're gonna save you.
You're running this rescue? Oh, great. I'm dead.
translation.it: Ci pensi tu? Allora sono morto.

translation.en: -[groans] -Will you stop? I got this.
[shouting] Please! Someone!
Anybody else!
[crying] Tower Two is the worst!
[yells] What are you doing?
You're gonna leave us alone for the rest of the summer.
translation.it: Ci lascerai in pace, d'ora in poi.

translation.en: No, I'm not!
Whoa! Wait, wait, what are you doing? Are you crazy?
-Stop it! -I will.
If you stop giving us bad assignments. It has to be fair from now on.
translation.it: ma basta compiti ingrati. Sii giusto, d'ora in poi.

translation.en: But I want to ruin your summer.
-[Dylan grunts] -[Brody] Okay, fine, fine! Fine! I'll stop, I'll stop. Just please...
translation.it: Va bene, mi fermo, ti prego...

translation.en: Please get me out of here. [groans]
-[screams] -Get ready to pull him up!
Never mind!
[panting] I can't believe... we blew that up... by mouth.
-Why isn't there a pump for this thing? -[panting] There is.
-[Brody grunting] -We just don't have... an extension cord.
[shouting] She cut the rope! She's insane!
translation.it: Ha tagliato la corda. È pazza.

translation.en: She cut the rope!
Who does that?
-[whistle jangles] -Ow! I fell on my whistle.
Yo, Dylan, I can't believe you dropped him. That was hardcore.
translation.it: L'hai fatto cadere, è stato forte.

translation.en: You are crazy.
No, she's crazy.
Still don't hear it. Come on.
That was a surprisingly baller move.
Well, I'm a surprisingly baller lady. [laughs]
Don't worry. I won't tell them it was an accident.
translation.it: Non dirò che è stato fortuito.

translation.en: Thanks. They're totally worshiping me right now.
Hey, Dylan.
You're right. You're our captain, and maybe...
translation.it: Hai ragione. Sei il capitano e forse...

translation.en: there's kind of a possibility that... I should have listened to you today.
Is there anything you wanna say to me?
I agree. You should've listened to me.
Come on, let's finish our assignments.
Uh, I'm not going near those swim fins. An octopus peed on me today.
translation.it: Basta pinne. Un polipo mi ha fatto la pipì addosso.

translation.en: Please tell me you washed your hands.
I did not.
Hope you don't mind. I gotta make a quick stop at Adam Schwartzman's bar mitzvah before I take you guys home.
translation.it: Scusate, devo fermarmi al bar mitzvah di Adam Schwartzman.

translation.en: I'm Adam.
Today I became a man. Put that arm around me, and you won't be one for long.
translation.it: - Oggi divento un uomo. - Fallo e non lo sarai a lungo.

translation.en: [Vooch] Hey, guys.
Does anyone know where we're going? I'm not lost.
translation.it: Sapete dove stiamo andando? Non mi sono perso.

translation.en: -But I might be. -[engine sputtering]
♪ I was gonna be that one in a million ♪
